name: Punch ALPHA
description:
This is the Alpha release for our upcoming title. We're very excited to share this demo level with you all! When you're finished playing, please fill out our Alpha Tester form here: https://forms.gle/xigzrLDFvBS4cR5g8  (your responses are super helpful!)

Also, just FYI, we forgot to add a Quit button. So when you're done playing, hold ALT + TAB and close the game manually.

If you're interested in keeping up with this game's development, please consider following us on Itch.io,  or following our social media:
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/CardboardSpork
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/cardboardspork/
YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCo_mem_6dsiWzmuwsUsO9Ug
